Stratechery by Ben Thompson #reader

## Summary
The text discusses how firms with integrated product architectures have a competitive advantage over modular ones in the AI space, with Google leading the way through its integrated approach. Google's focus on vertical integration, building from chips to consumer-facing AI apps, is highlighted as a unique strategy with potential for disruption in both consumer and enterprise markets. The analysis contrasts Google's integrated approach with Amazon's modular strategy, emphasizing the importance of maximizing efficiency and optimization in AI development.
